# potteR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This package contains functions to aid and streamline the analysis of archaeological ceramics from Africa. It is currently in the early stages of development.

## Installation

You can install the development version of potteR from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("nickgestrich/potteR")
```

## Usage

Please see the vignettes on how to use this package.
